author: djrtwo
content: proof of custody is a crypto-economic commitment taht you have the data you are claiming exists and is valid

author: djrtwo
content: This is used in sharding for committee members claim on data

author: djrtwo
content: but you can use it on a (large) execution trace as well to prove that you did execution locally

author: djrtwo
content: (assuming you make hte execution trace too large to reasonably (or cheaply) get from an external party
